alert.note: Alert for Kent; Muskegon; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Kent, Ottawa and southeastern Muskegon Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 204 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 31 miles west of Grand Haven to 29 miles west of Saugatuck. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Holland... Grand Haven... Wyoming... Kentwood... Walker... Grandville... East Grand Rapids... Hudsonville... Zeeland... Coopersville... Sparta... Ferrysburg... Spring Lake... Ravenna... Fruitport... Allendale... Beechwood... Jenison... Holland SP... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southwestern and west central Michigan.
